Package it.uninsubria.bookrecommender

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.bookrecommender.Utils
class Utils extends Object
Static class with helper methods using in the main app.

  • Method Details

    • assertTrue

      static boolean assertTrue(boolean predicate, String errMsg)
      Helper function that prints an error message to stderr if a condition is not met.
      Parameters:
      predicate - the condition evaluated.
      errMsg - the message printed to stderr in the case the condition is false.
      Returns:
      the value of predicate.

    • csvReader

      static <T> ArrayList<T> csvReader(String filepath, Class<T> type)
      Reads a file in a list of a given class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the class we want to instatiate.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path of the csv file we want to read.
      type - the class we want to instatiate. it has to have a constructor with only a string representing the csvLine.
      Returns:
      a mutable list of class type.

    • csvReaderFiltered

      static <T> ArrayList<String> csvReaderFiltered(String filepath, Predicate<String> f)
      Reads a file in a list of strings, excluding the lines that do not respect the predicate.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic type for the predicate.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path of the csv file we want to read.
      f - we want to filter each line based on the predicate.
      Returns:
      a list of strings read from csv line filtered base on the predicate.

    • cerca

      static <T> List<T> cerca(List<T> items, Predicate<T> f)
      Looks for an item in a list.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the class we want to instatiate for the list.
      Parameters:
      items - list of objects where we wanna search.
      f - predicate where we filter to look for a specific item.
      Returns:
      a list where there are the items we looked for in the predicate.

    • csvWriter

      static void csvWriter(String file, List<String> data, String lineToWrite)
      Writes a list of strings to a file in the csv format, recursively.
      Parameters:
      file - the filepath where we write the data.
      data - the data we are writing to file.
      lineToWrite - buffer where we store the data written at each recursive call. if we need to append in front something to the text we can write in it when we call the method, otherwise we leave it empty

    • generateRandomChar

      static String generateRandomChar()
      Generates dummy character for debugging purposes.
      Returns:
      random alphabet character.

      static int generateFromInterval(int lower, int upper)
      Generates dummy integer from interval for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      lower - lower bound.
      upper - upper bound.
      Returns:
      integer in the interval.

    • generateRandomString

      static String generateRandomString(int length, String out)
      Creates dummy string for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      length - length of the generated string.
      out - buffer where we pass the string recursively.
      Returns:
      random generated string.
